content.likes: It is really easy to master and, you can create a lot of courses in a short amount of time! It is nice that we can speak to a help desk 24/7 and the answers are also coming really fast!
content.dislikes: It isn't very flexible—think of how PowerPoint and Word work. However, this lack of flexibility can make it harder to ensure accessibility. The integration could have been better for us. It was difficult because there was not an API available for us.
content.benefits: They are currently developing video creation features in Easygenerator, and I am quite curious to see how this will integrate with AI.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hey Nessa, Really nice to hear you’re creating lots of courses with ease. That’s exactly what Easygenerator is built for. And our support team will love reading your note — fast, helpful answers are what they do it for. If you ever need a hand, our support team is just one click away and always happy to help. We'll try to get in touch regarding the points you mentioned. Thanks for sharing your thoughts.

reviewer.name: Dalysha D.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

review.title: AI Assistance and Effortless Document Import Make EasyGen Stand Out

content.likes: The assistance of the AI feature is amazing, being able to import/integrate a document/presentation and EasyGen being able to keep the format. I also love how quickly I am able to implement the presentation into LearnUpon, I don't have to worry about downloading it then reuploading.
content.dislikes: It does have a tendency to lag every now and then. I do wish it had the option of uploading higher quality photos.
content.benefits: It has enhanced our overall training resources and processes. As a result, both new and current hires can now access our product information more easily and efficiently.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Dalysha, Thanks for sharing this. Great to hear the AI features and document imports are helping you move fast, and that pushing courses to LearnUpon is just as smooth. If lag or anything else ever gets in the way of creating courses, our support team is one click away and happy to help or take a closer look.

content.likes: The flexibility and vast variety of interactive elements that can be added. Easy to use and 24x7 customer support
content.dislikes: Nothing. I really like the platform as it is.
content.benefits: EG is assisting us in developing valuable training materials for our employees. It also makes it easier for IT to manage and monitor all the content.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Vinay, Thanks for the great review. Nice to hear that the flexibility and interactive elements are working well for you, and that you find the platform easy to use. And big thanks for the kind words about our support team. Excited to keep assisting you in 2026 as well with many more new training materials.

content.likes: The best about this application is that i can include text, image, video, quiz, has mutliple options to explore, its just easier to understand and to start creating a course
content.dislikes: I would suggest team to bring an option to add voice where we can include Audio too
content.benefits: The main help of using this application is that its a multi Purpose applcaition like i can create contents, add images, add videos, add quiz for the users, i can make it as an test. its very useful

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Hinduja, Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. Great to hear you love the interactive options you can add to your courses. We also have the option to add narration or audio within your courses. If you need help adding this feel free to reach out to our suppor team. They're 24/5 available via the chat. Thanks again for the review.

reviewer.name: Elaine M.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

content.likes: When I took on the role of L&D in my organisation, I was one person looking after it for 250+ people. I knew we were planning on getting different areas of the organisation to create e-learnings in order to facilitate knowledge sharing but other platforms etc were going to be difficult to train people, especially when not in the L&D space day to day. Not only is our customer success manager amazing, so are the various trainers who have helped us seamlessly implement EasyGenerator across the organisation. This platform is simple enough for our subject matter experts to use and the course builder functionalities mean they can use materials in other formats to give them a starting point. I cannot recommend EasyGenerator enough, especially for a small L&D team.
content.dislikes: There are not many! The only one I can think of is that some of our authors would like to be able to use the text to speech tool to put a narration over a video e.g. screen recording.
content.benefits: Helping to facilitate knowledge sharing and cross-training among the different divisions of the organisation. Content can be created directly by the SMEs themselves rather than the L&D team.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Elaine, Thank you for the thoughtful review! It’s inspiring to hear how Easygenerator is supporting you as a one-person L&D team and empowering your subject matter experts to create and share knowledge across the organization. That’s exactly the kind of impact we strive for. We’re also appreciate to hear your kind words about our customer success team—it means a lot to us. As for your feedback on adding narration over video: great news! A new feature to support this is on the way, and we’re excited for you and your authors to try it soon.

reviewer.name: Mohammed N.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

review.title: Creative Content Author and main admin.

content.likes: Designed from the group up to solve issues around user generated content for an organisation and harnessing the knowledge of SME's. It is relatively simple to mirror you author structure and start creating content. I am the chief admin and use it daily to support, maintain and develop content. I have to day converted approx 1500 powerpoint slides into interactive, attractive content and this tool approx  4 months, so it was really easy to implement. Many thanks to my business success manager!  It is an elegant solution for a particular set of problems. The customer support is world class. There is chat option where the response is really fast by live agents, approx. within the hour by my experience. The support tool also gives you access to a comprehensive wiki and a lot of issues can be resolved this way. Most cases of requiring support were localised server or browser issues. The platform has maintained 100% uptime in the 2 or so years we have used it for our company. There is a transparent roadmap and a lovely surprise when they happen as they have ALWAYS been for the betterment for product and user experience. Many thanks for the testing/dev department and their communication. I believe these update comms can be turned off too from your profile. We have not required an special integration however I want to report deep integration exists between branded LXP's and the authoring tool. Although we did not require this, we still use the "dynamic updates" feature of SCORM publishing which is a game changer.
content.dislikes: It is designed it for a specific purpose so lacks the complexity of other authoring tools by design. Some more customisation would also be handy for certain situations although this may not be beneficial for less technically sound authors.
content.benefits: Course content generation and maintenance. SME knowledge transfer, so when  SME's leave the business there is a minimum loss of knowledge. Upskilling internal employers. Providing external courses for partners, including, colleges, merchants and small businesses.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Mohammed, Wow, thank you for such a comprehensive review! We really appreciate the time you took to share your experience and discussing different angles of our product. It’s great to hear how Easygenerator has helped you convert 1,500 PowerPoint slides into engaging content so efficiently! Thanks again for being such a dedicated user. We’re proud to support your knowledge-sharing efforts.

reviewer.name: Leni Virginia Celene R.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

content.likes: This tool is really user-friendly, you can create your own courses, make your trainings engaging and different. If you work with different language trainings like me this will simplify your life, because you can translate them in seconds, as well adding voice-overs! It also has a lot of interactive buttons, which makes your trainings more entertaining!
content.dislikes: I wish it has more options regarding colors, being able to modify the boxes and cards with different colors would be nice, but is not as important as other features that actually work very well in easygen!
content.benefits: It saves me a lot of time, as well if I don't have an LMS I can share via link! It makes my trainings more engaging and fun to learn, with the interactive buttons, embedded videos, and images!

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Leni, Thanks for sharing your experience! We're so glad Easygenerator is saving you time and helping you create trainings that are fun and engaging to follow. Keep up the great work!

reviewer.name: Jill D.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

content.likes: I’ve been using the Easy Generator program that our company purchased last year to build and update training courses on our Learn Upon platform, and I’m thoroughly impressed. I had no idea just how user-friendly it would be! The program has exceeded my expectations by offering a variety of ways to create training that isn’t just informative, but also engaging and interactive. It’s been a game-changer in making our courses more dynamic, and I love how easy it is to incorporate fun elements into the learning experience. This tool has truly enhanced the way we approach training, and I’m excited to continue using it for future course updates."
content.dislikes: I have not found a down side to this program.
content.benefits: I am the company trainer and i create the new content as we have new products every month. i need to be able to update the current course, rebuild old ones and find new ways to make them interactive and fun. Easy generator is very user friendly, has a lot of ways to make the courses different, engaging, look professional and fun. this program saves me a lot of time because it is easy to use. if i have any questions, the help center is great because someone will answer me in minimal amount of time and not hold me from completing on my timeline.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Jill, Thank you for the thoughtful review! It’s great to hear Easygenerator is helping you create engaging, interactive training while saving you time—especially with new content coming in every month. We also really appreciate the kind words about our support team. We value great support highly and have shared your feedback with them—they’ll love hearing it. Thanks again for sharing your experience. We’re glad to be part of your course creation journey!

reviewer.name: Fumiko K.
reviewer.job_title: Lecturer cum Senior Digital Learning Designer

review.title: Create visually appealing interactive content with ease

content.likes: "The interface is intuitive and user-friendly, allowing for effortless navigation. Content can be easily repurposed and duplicated. What stands out is their customer service (staffed by real people rather than AI) delivering high-quality responses and implementing requests with remarkable speed.
content.dislikes: There is a weekly maintenance period when the platform is inaccessible. In Malaysia, this falls on Thursday afternoons, which can be somewhat inconvenient. However, this downtime seems necessary to maintain the impressive pace of usability improvements. As long as you plan your schedule with awareness of this regular maintenance window, it poses no significant issue.
content.benefits: It's extremely helpful for creating interactive and engaging content. The intuitive placement and editing of images and text allows for a completely stress-free workflow.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Fumiko, Thanks for sharing your experience! We're so glad to hear the interface feels intuitive and that creating content has become a smooth process. Big thanks as well for shouting out our support team—we’ll definitely pass the compliments along to them! Appreciate the feedback on the maintenance window. We aim to push improvements frequently, but we know the timing of updates can be tricky. We’ll keep looking for ways to make it as seamless as possible. Thanks for being part of the journey!

reviewer.name: Andy G.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

review.title: Great platform and so easy to use

content.likes: EasyGenerator simplifies e-learning course creation with its intuitive interface and drag-and-drop functionality. Its standout feature is seamless real-time collaboration, making teamwork effortless. AI-powered suggestions and built-in templates enhance efficiency, ensuring courses maintain a professional look. customer support is great and only a click away using the instant chat options. For anyone seeking an accessible yet powerful course development tool, EasyGenerator is a top choice.
content.dislikes: Nothing. it is so simple to use. We are very happy with its functionality
content.benefits: Its making creating courses so easy but at the same time making it look so professional.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator

reviewer.name: Neil W.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Neil, Thanks for the fantastic review—and for being with us over the years! We truly appreciate your continued support.

reviewer.name: Samantha S.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

content.likes: Like that it allows you to get really creative, the AI functions give you some brilliant ideas how to communicate information in a different way to learners.  Courses look really professional and have been well received by my team.  EG allows me to create training content which is bespoke for the learning needs of my team.
content.dislikes: Can be a bit tricky to get risk immediately, I did find that I needed to practice and spend time playing about with the different functions.  Sometimes the AI function does repeat information and you do have to carefully proof read and juggle it about.
content.benefits: Training large groups over a wide geographical area, time saving quick courses for the learners to fit in during work time, creating learning content to work alongside physical training.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Samantha, Thanks for the fantastic review! We love seeing you get creative by leveraging the power of AI. With a bit of practice, it really opens up great opportunities to make your courses even more impactful. It’s wonderful to hear your team has been enjoying them! When reviewing AI-generated content, we recommend involving co-authors to help fine-tune and add company-specific context. And of course, our support team is always here if you need a hand. Thanks again for sharing your experience—we’re excited to keep supporting you as you scale learning across your organization.

content.likes: Easy to learn! Variety of options for interactive content creation. Love that scorm packages can easily be updated in our LMS with just the click of a button, no more downloading and re-uploading constantly.
content.dislikes: It’s not a dislike, but I do think it would be cool to have more interactive options
content.benefits: Creating effective training courses for our LMS platform

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hey Allison, Really great to hear this. Easy to learn, good mix of interactive options, and no more SCORM upload headaches. That’s exactly the experience we want people to have. And you're right, the more ways to keep learners engaged, the better. We're always on the lookout for new interactive features, so if you’ve got ideas, feel free to drop them to our support team. They’re just one click away from inside the platform. Thanks for sharing this.

review.title: Easy Generator is simplistic yet extremely effective and fantastic value for money!

content.likes: I love that it's both an authoring tool and reporting system and not just a stand alone authoring tool that you need an expensive LMS to integrate with.
content.dislikes: The only improvement I regularly crave is the ability to do more reporting at individual user level. Not all users will need that, but us admins are always asked for in depth reports and currently I have to export the csv and create a report in something else.
content.benefits: The ability to track that training has been completed is invaluable for compliance, but also, the conversion of ppt's into e-Learning creates a much better experience for the learners.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Bobby, Thank you for sharing your experience with Easygenerator! We’re glad our product is giving you the flexibility to create and track training without having to rely on a separate LMS. To answer your comment on reporting: you can view data at the individual learner level, including course enrollments, results, scores, and certificates. Hope that helps with your work. Appreciate you taking the time to share your experience!

reviewer.name: Tim H.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

content.likes: Clean, intuitive interface makes creating engaging content simple. I use Easygenerator on a daily basis and am finding the process of converting existing learning relatively straight-forward. In most cases I'm able to leverage features within Easygenerator to improve the course contents.  Customer support is quick, friendly and helpful.
content.dislikes: a few minor bugs when using dark themes, text on card sorter is not visible
content.benefits: Allowing us to provide a simple creation tool that SMEs can get up to speed with quickly

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Tim, Thanks for the great review! It's great to hear that our easy to use interface and features are helping you turn existing learning materials into even more engaging courses. It's also great to know our support team has been there for you. We’ve passed your note about the dark theme and card sorter visibility to our product team. Thanks again for sharing your experience—and here’s to enabling even more SMEs to share their knowledge with ease!

review.title: Crafting Interactive and Engaging Content with Ease

content.likes: Easygenerator is a powerful ally for anyone looking to create compelling and interactive educational content. Its intuitive design, pre-defined content blocks, and time-saving features make it an essential resource for modern educators. By simplifying the content creation process, this tool empowers educators to deliver high-quality, engaging learning experiences with ease. And on top of that, their support team is supurb! Fast response times when you need it, and delivered with expertise.
content.dislikes: I cannot say that there is something I dislike about the tool.
content.benefits: This content creation tool effectively addresses common challenges such as non-compliance with company style guides, inconsistent approaches and appearances, and the creation of dull courses. It simplifies the process of developing interactive and appealing content, ensuring adherence to didactical methods with minimal effort while being compliant to the company styleguide with styleguide themes and company templates.

We relied on all our team and product leads to create the courses within EasyGenerator and there was zero issues with teams creating courses. Customer support was incredible with amazing support, even in a different country.  The courses we created were easily integrated into our LMS - I also love how easy it was to update the courses in our LMS.
content.dislikes: My only complaint is you cannot maximize the videos with the dynamic update feature.
content.benefits: Creating engaging courses for our team to better enhance their product knowledge and sell more products. We've received nothing but positive feedback from using EG.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Brittnie, Thanks for sharing your experience! We're so glad to hear how quickly your team got up and running. And it’s also great to hear our support team was there for you when you needed it. Thanks again for the great review!

reviewer.name: Kathy S.
reviewer.job_title: Senior Learning and Development Technology Specialist

review.title: Great tool incorporating Generative AI that allows small teams to get a lot done!

content.likes: Easygenerator is extremely user-friendly and speeds up the process of creating quality eLearning courses. I appreciate that I don't have to worry about page layout or navigation features, and every course is automatically responsively designed so that's another design concern immediately resolved.
content.dislikes: A recently added feature is AI Generated Images. I have found the images to be hit or miss with how well they fit what I am looking for.
content.benefits: I am part of a team of 2, and the main eLearning creator. Other departments have cancelled their learning vendor contracts and are increasing their internal development requests. This tool has allowed me to meet and exceed those requests!

reviewer.name: Alyssa M.
reviewer.source: G2 invite on behalf of seller

review.title: Easy to use as an external content creator for LMS

content.likes: Easygenerator offers the ability to customize to follow our companies brand guidelines. There are many options on how to recall information and make the learning more engaging.
content.dislikes: I wish there was a better way to link a document or PPT. It loads in just fine - but it puts it in a PDF viewer mode and looks clunky.
content.benefits: Creating consistent training for several roles across the company.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Alyssa, Thanks so much for sharing your experience! We're thrilled to hear that Easygenerator is helping you create consistent training across teams

content.likes: I’ve been really impressed with Easygenerator! Course building is a breeze with their AI-generated templates and super easy builder. The one-click PowerPoint conversion and text-to-speech voice generation are awesome features that save so much time. Plus, their chat support is fantastic. I had some complex questions, and every rep I spoke with was able to guide me in the right direction. It’s just an all-around great tool with top-notch support. Highly recommend!
content.dislikes: While Easygenerator has a lot of great features, there is a bit of a learning curve to really unlock everything it can do. That said, their support team is super responsive and knowledgeable, which definitely helps. I do wish there were more customization options in the course builder—it would be nice to have a bit more flexibility there. Overall, though, it’s a solid tool with great support.
content.benefits: Easygenerator solves our LMS’s lack of customization and SCORM support. It allows us to create branded courses easily and ensures they are SCORM-compliant, fixing both issues effortlessly.

review.title: It's called EASYgenerator for a reason

content.likes: Incredible customer service. Very personalized. Incredible easy to use for a first time LMS course generator.
content.dislikes: I haven't found anything I'd want to change about it! They're constantly coming with new releases from customer suggestions. They're very on top of who their demographic is and what their customers want!
content.benefits: Easy course generation to automate a lot of our tech stack tutorials and onboarding process.

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Nadia, We’ve got to admit—when we saw your review title, it made us smile big time! Thanks so much for your kind words. It’s great to hear the platform has made your course creation and onboarding process easier, and that our support team has been helpful along the way. We put a lot of value on offering great support—because we know creating content takes more than just the right tools. Thanks for being part of the journey.

content.likes: Easygenerator is easy to use, no special computer knowledge is required to generate quality e-learnings. The user experience is great and the online help is efficient, with quick responses and sound advice. The number of templates that can serve as a basis for creating your e-learnings is impressive. The AI is also very effective and even allows for the generation of complete courses in just a few clicks. The type of content you can integrate into your e-learnings is relatively comprehensive and always very easy to use.
content.dislikes: There is currently no way to force your learners to view all the content of your e-learnings (they can move to the next section without having clicked on all the elements or, for example, watching a video in full).
content.benefits: Simplicity and speed in creating quality e-learning

content.benefits: Training sales people in multiple locations

official_response.author: Team Easygenerator
official_response.text: Hi Danny, Thanks for the great review! We’re excited to hear how much you’re enjoying EasyAI and our new role-play feature. We’ve noted your feedback about occasional glitches and have shared it with our product team. If you experience anything else, don’t hesitate to reach out to our support team anytime — they’re always happy to help and typically respond within just 2 minutes. Thanks again for sharing your experience!

review.title: Great tool to develop and share training courses

content.likes: The AI functionalility to upload files and documents.
content.dislikes: Translations ae not perfect and text on media files cannot be read and translated.
content.benefits: EasyGenerator gives me a platform to easily create courses, share courses and keep record of participants. A easy and complete LMS.

content.likes: the platform is extermely versatile and can help create many different trainings. the chat feature is very helpful as an EG assoicate is always available to answer questions.
content.dislikes: some features are not intuitive. that being said, the chat feature is extremely helpful and associates are always availble to support with screenshots and guidance.
content.benefits: EG allows me to create course and tests with a variety of features. it allows for engaging learning design and versatile test features.

review.title: Quick and Easy creating e-learning courses

content.likes: Easy to use
content.dislikes: The pages will have a white background.
content.benefits: For me it's replacing Abobe Captivate.

review.title: Easy to create Articulate Story Lines

content.likes: Easygenerator is very useful to help create video training materials. It can be used to create something like Articulate Story Lines. The best part is that it can be integrated easily as you just have to login using your respective accounts and the organisation data comes up. Adding to it, they provide 24x5 customer support wherein we can interact live with people and not just chat bots.
content.dislikes: The one thing which I faced a difficulty while working on easygenerator is that while creating materials, when we try to add questions, we can only add one type of question in a particular section. If I want to add another type of question then again it'll be added in the next section. For example if I want to add a true or false question and a multiple choice question in the same section, I felt it was a bit difficult.
content.benefits: Creating articulate storylines and making trainings highly interactive.

review.title: Easy, Functional, and Fast Content Authoring Tool

content.likes: I love the easy use of the tool. I can easily get my colleagues on board using it to create content in less than an hour. It is also fairly comprehensive, doing what you need to do quickly.
content.dislikes: There are some of the wording in the default settings that I would love to change to create content packages that are not courses. It is also pricey for education institutions like ours.
content.benefits: We needed a tool to get a lot of our original content in a format that is easy to use. The SCORM packages created by this tool do just that, and allow for us to port the content to many different platforms with ease.

content.likes: Easygenerator has a very intuitive user interface and thus easy to use.
content.dislikes: I have not yet encountered anything I dislike.
content.benefits: Mental health software is rapidly evolving. Though this ever-evolving access to new software can be good for business it is frustrating for employees. Easygenerator provides a 'quick and easy' solution. 'Quick', because it takes little time to create a course and 'Easy' because it offers simple, yet effective ways to train and test employees.

review.title: Easy for our customers & easy for us.

content.likes: The variety of question types help us to make our eLearnings as interesting and interactive as we want them to be. I think this is the key to have our learners coming back to our eLearning platform.
content.dislikes: EasyGenerator is on a good way to offer more LMS function but yet offers only limited Reporting and Customer Management options.
content.benefits: As a medium-sized company, working with both an authoring tool and a LMS was simply not possible. EasyGenerator offers both and is much more than a compromise.

review.title: Easy to Use, Create courses Quickly

content.likes: The templates are visually appealing, and straightforward enough to allow anyone to create a course asap
content.dislikes: They could have more robust reporting, and course completion criteria. But they offer what any other course authoring tool has
content.benefits: Course creation with different types of content assets. they have tons of quiz options and content types.

review.title: Excellent service, very supportive customer care and responsive to queries.

content.likes: Easy to use, very practical and relevant to online learning and training.
content.dislikes: Pricing is very limiting from a forex point of view.
content.benefits: Helping to train staff at self-pace. Working for a school, with remote learning.

content.likes: That it makes the subject matter expert or learning and development coordinator the author of the learning content; its like placing the L&D coordinator in the driver's seat, rather than just being a passenger along for the ride.
content.dislikes: So far I can't find anything that I dislike.
content.benefits: We are just at the demonstration stages of creating learning content with easygenerator; it has not actually be used as yet.  However, from what I've experienced of it so far, I'm able to perceive that it will be an excellent, relatable and real time tool to transmit knowledge and information in a way and at a pace that it aligned to the needs and inclinations of the learner.

review.title: Couldn't be better named! It is Easy to Generate eLearnings!

content.likes: The simplicity, how quickly you can get up and running
content.dislikes: The quality of the uploaded images are not clear
content.benefits: Creating lots of great content simply!

review.title: Easygenerator's short learning curve enables us to produce a lot of high quality e-learning.

content.likes: The ease of use and simplicity of the UI.
content.dislikes: No branching and no integraton for screen capture, to develop software package training.
content.benefits: The transfer of offline training to online training.

content.likes: What I like the most about EasyGenerator is how smooth the user experience is. It is so intuitive that you can master the tool in just a few minutes.
content.dislikes: To be honest, nothing I can think of. I feel EasyGenerator is always ahead of my needs.
content.benefits: EasyGenerator gave us the possibility to build elearnings for our 3rd parties which cannot have access to our internal learning management system.

content.likes: How easy it is to throw ideas as they come to mind, then re-arrange on the fly
content.dislikes: Can't think of anything missing, but perhaps I need to spend more time using the tool
content.benefits: Providing training to our employees

content.likes: Easy to learn and use.  Great support team.
content.dislikes: I would love to be able to integrate videos and work instructions in the same flow.
content.benefits: Technical training using video-based training aids.

content.likes: We can use it for many case of usage (e-learning, coaching, exam, ...)
content.dislikes: the limitation of courses i can do, i would like more.
content.benefits: Create or migrate faster courses to e-learning

content.likes: I used this easy generator tool to migrate courses from Articulate 360. I thoroughly enjoyed using the Test/Assessment section and enjoyed the Template Management.
content.dislikes: Last time I had used Easygenerator was sometime in April 2019. Until then, what I found most challenging task for content creation was to get into the third level of sub headings and content. It had allowed only 2 levels. Not sure if this feature has been fixed by now.
content.benefits: I found this as a multi-platform supportive tool.
